name: A Sacrifice (itch Spooktober Jam 2021)
description:
"Beast comes every nineteenth year.

We need to execute the protection ritual to stop him."

"A Sacrifice" is a small point-and-click adventure/escape room style game.

This is my very first game, so please be understanding of any possible bugs you might encounter. You may direct your bug report emails at: bugreport [at] razieligor [dot] com

I could only test this game on 1920x1080 resolution, it might not work on other resolutions.

Controls:

Use Mouse for interaction and Escape key to access the main menu.

Have fun!
